caption.p: Schematic representation of a lineage A betacoronavirus virion (© 2012 International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses; publ. Elsevier Inc.) S: the spike (glyco) protein (responsible for binding to the host cell receptor ACE2 in SARS CoV and 2019-nCoV); HE: Hemagglutinin Esterase (not expressed in B lineage, see also Fig. 1b). M membrane glycoprotein, N nucleocapsid protein, E envelope protein. Both S and HE proteins are heavily glycosylated, M contains a small number of glycans, concerning the species. Moreover, the S and E proteins are palmitoylated, providing them their hydrophobic features
